name: Flask Tutorial
tagline: Intro to Web Development with Python for Data Scientists
body:
### Flask Tutorial

You know python?  You want to quickly publish your data, graphs, reports on the web?
You need to collect data from users via the web and/or mobile devices?  Then learn a little flask
and program it all yourself!

```
pip install flask
```

### Authors and Contributors
@bjelline a
